ModMetaData.name: MineralsFrozen_SK
ModMetaData.author: Zachary Foster
ModMetaData.description:
For RimWorld Hardcore SK v1
Mod version 1.1.0
<size=24>Description</size>
Must come after Minerals_SK in the loading order.
It adds ice-related content, inlcuding dynamic ice/snow formations and building walls with snow and ice.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsFrozen_SK for detailed documentation.
